# Submitting Assignments {-}

You will complete an assignment each week throughout this course. Before class, you will be responsible for watching and reading the outlined materials for that week (labeled **Watch** and **Read**). After class, you will do an assignment that puts together everything we discussed (labeled **Do**) -- due no later than 11:59p on Thursday before the following class.

## Box {-}

You will submit your assignments by emailing them to the appropriate Box email address listed under **Do**. 

## Grading {-}

See [Course grading](#course-grading) for an explanation of how your grades will be calculated.
